title: The Blue Moon
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, by 1977; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute (subsequently Carnegie Museum of Art,) Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1999 [1].

Notes:
[1]. The watercolor was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on December 28, 1999.  Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1999 year-end gift was taken on February 3, 2000.
